library:
<class name="robot_calibration/CheckerboardFinder" type="robot_calibration::CheckerboardFinder" base_class_type="robot_calibration::FeatureFinder"> Feature finder that detect checkerboards in point clouds.
<class name="robot_calibration/CheckerboardFinder2d" type="robot_calibration::CheckerboardFinder" base_class_type="robot_calibration::FeatureFinder"> Feature finder that detect checkerboards in 2d images.
Feature finder that detect LED patterns (fairly Fetch-specific).
Feature finder that detects points corresponding to planes.
Feature finder that detects points corresponding to the ground plane and the robot.
Feature finder that detects points from a laser scan.
